title: Best of the Program | Guest: James Lindsay | 4/14/22
description:
Glenn starts off the show by discussing the horrific footage from Shanghai, as citizens are killing themselves due to starvation and animals are being killed to “protect” them from COVID-19. Glenn discusses the decline of the Chinese government as it turned to communism. Author James Lindsay joins to discuss the cult dynamics of wokeism.
